channel.title: How do u make items nontradable?
channel.description: i have been a private server coder for a long time, i usually figure thing out for my self, but i cant seem to figure this out? anyone that can help me?

item.title: How do u make items nontradable?
item.dc:creator: @Devildreams54 Devildreams54
item.description:
@Devildreams54 wrote:

open up client java and search “public int untradable” (without quotations)

you should see something that looks like
Code:
public int untradable[] = {6570,1129,3101,3140}; // put all untradable itemz here bitchz XD - xero

public boolean isUntradable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) {
if(untradable[i] == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}

or
Code:
[public int untradable[] = {6306,2978,2979,2980,2981,2982,2983,2984,2985,2986,2987,2988,2989,2990,2991,2992,2993,2994,2995,6856,6857,6858,6859,6860,6861,6862,6863,6392,6393,6394,6395,6396,6397,6398,6399,6400,6401,6402,6403,6404,1419,3777,1031,3759,3787,3761,2412,3783,3785,4375,6070,3763,3781,1007,1021,1019,3765,1027,3789,3779,1023,1029}; //Narbmark: UNTRADABLE ITEMS

public boolean isUntradable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) {
if(untradable[i] == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}

all you have to do is put your items id into the rest of them file,save

Read full topic

item.title: How do u make items nontradable?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

thats in client.java right? im guess all servers should have that so i shouldnt have to add that int

found this

[code]public int untradable[] = {}; // put all untradable itemz here bitchz XD - xero

public boolean isUntradable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) {
if(untradable[i] == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

but how do i add the item ids in, like wheere do i put them?

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make items nontradable?

item.title: How do u make items nontradable?

@delta wrote:

Add the item id in public int untradable
